thread.title: Glitter obsessed babes are going to love MAC Cosmetics’ new Metallic Lips collection
thread.title_full: Glitter obsessed babes are going to love MAC Cosmetics’ new Metallic Lips collection

author: Jascmeen
title: Glitter obsessed babes are going to love MAC Cosmetics’ new Metallic Lips collection
text:
Glitter obsessed babes are going to love MAC Cosmetics’ new Metallic Lips collection Sorry mattes, but we couldn’t be happier to see the metallic lipstick trend making a comeback . Between Beauty Bakerie’s Lip Whips and Pat McGrath’s now legendary Lust 004 glitter lip kit , disco lips are having a moment , and we’re totally on board.
Get ready for a whole new lineup of shimmery goodness. MAC’s new Metallic Lips collection drops March 23rd, and it features a whopping 18 shades.
The new Metallic Lips lipsticks will be priced at $17, the same as their permanent shades.
That Midas glow. ✨ #MACBackstage at Lanvin, #PFW #AW17. Pictured: #NEW Metallic Lipstick (coming soon!) 
A post shared by M·A·C Cosmetics (@maccosmetics) on Mar 3, 2017 at 7:02pm PST 
Here’s an up close and personal look at the new lipstick shades. 1. Act So Cool, a brownish shade with gold metal pearl. Courtesy of MAC 2. Anything Once, a blackened blue with multi-colored pearl elements. Courtesy of MAC 3. This frosted periwinkle is called Cold Front. Courtesy of MAC 4. Here’s Devotional, a metallic purple/brown. Courtesy of MAC 5. We have a feeling Digging for Gold, a light brown with gold glitter, will be one of the most popular shades of the collection. Courtesy of MAC 6. Meet the ultimate girl’s night 0ut shade — Disobedient. Courtesy of MAC 7. This blue pink shade goes by the name of Foiled Rose. Courtesy of MAC 8. We’re thinking of stocking up on Hades Fire. We’ve got a feeling we’ll be needing a fresh tube of this cool red burgundy for the holiday season. Courtesy of MAC 9. Not quite ready to go for a full-out disco lip? Start with the light warm neutral shade In Lust. Courtesy of MAC 
10. Jupiter, a bronze neutral. Courtesy of MAC 11. You can never have too many vampy shades, Metal Head is a blackened purple with multicolored metallic flecks. Courtesy of MAC 12. ’90s babes will love this muted gold shade Modern Midas. Courtesy of MAC 13. We can’t wait to see swatches of the blackened navy Nightly Ritual. Courtesy of MAC 14. Pale Rosé is THE summer brunch shade. Courtesy of MAC 15. Pearly One is for the bold. This confetti’d white frost is MAJOR. Courtesy of MAC 16. Royal Hour is a deep purple with blue pearl. Courtesy of MAC 17. This multidimensional silver shade is Silver Spoon. Courtesy of MAC 18. Zerocool is bringing the OZ vibes. Courtesy of MAC We’re absolutely not waiting for festival season to rock these shades, we need them ASAP. We can’t wait to see our fave vloggers play with these shades to get a better idea of their pigmentation. Have your lip liners sharpened and ready, because the collection hits stores and online March 23rd.
